snippet: At Ice*Amsterdam there is skating in the shadows of the Rijksmuseum — and a restaurant with a heated terrace and bar.
abstract: At Ice*Amsterdam there is skating in the shadows of the Rijksmuseum — and a restaurant with a heated terrace and bar.
lead_paragraph: Fans of Hans Brinker, the fictional Dutch boy who enters an ice-skating race to win a pair of silver skates, can practice their moves at Ice*Amsterdam, the recently opened skating rink in the shadows of the majestic Rijksmuseum, on Museum Square.

headline.main: New Luster for a Rink in Amsterdam
